articles.description: The company has cut the size of its IPO to Rs 865 crore from Rs 1,025 crore planned earlier. The reduction in the IPO size was a result of the pre-IPO placement carried out by the company, which amounted to Rs 160 crore.
articles.content: The Rs 865 crore-initial public offering (IPO) of electronic manufacturing services firm Avalon Technologies will open for subscription on 3rd April 2023. The 4-day IPO will close on April 6, and the… [+1893 chars]

articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Five of top 10-firms lose Rs 86,447 cr in m-cap; Infosys, TCS, SBI hit hard - Business Standard
articles.description: Five of the top 10 most valued firms together lost Rs 86,447.12 crore in market valuation last week, with Infosys, Tata Consultancy Services and State Bank of India taking the biggest hit.
articles.content:

articles.title: Crompton, Butterfly Indumathi Propose Merger - BQ Prime

articles.content:
